thread.title: Colton Haynes Completely Unrecognizable in Ursula the Sea Witch Costume
thread.title_full: Colton Haynes Completely Unrecognizable in Ursula the Sea Witch Costume

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Colton Haynes Completely Unrecognizable in Ursula the Sea Witch Costume
text:
Comments The actor, who is known for his muscular body, sports pale skin, white hair-rising wig and black robe while wearing black gown featuring pink pattern and plunging neckline. 
Colton Haynes showed off his Halloween costume days prior to the annual celebration. The hunky actor was completely unrecognizable when he donned a costume inspired by Ursula the Sea Witch, a character from Disney's " The Little Mermaid (1989) ". The " Arrow " actor took to Instagram on Saturday, October 24 to share some pictures and videos of him in the said costume. Colton sported pale skin, white hair-rising wig and black robe. He also donned black gown featuring pink pattern and plunging neckline. He left one of his nipples uncovered. "Poor unfortunate souls #Ursula," he wrote alongside one of the pictures. Foto kiriman Colton Haynes (@coltonlhaynes) pada Okt 24, 2015 pada 8:45 PDT In another picture, Colton struck a pose with his girlfriend Emily Bett Rickards . The Canadian actress wore a costume inspired by Japanese anime Sailor Moon. A caption for the picture read, "Heading out with my love @emilybett." Foto kiriman Colton Haynes (@coltonlhaynes) pada Okt 24, 2015 pada 9:12 PDT The other pictures Colton posted were hilariously captioned, "Ursula loves dinner," "Ursula loves friends. She's just like us" and "Ursula loves group selfies." In a video showing him munching on a snack, the actor said, "Hi, fans." He captioned the video, "Ursula loves her fans." Foto kiriman Colton Haynes (@coltonlhaynes) pada Okt 25, 2015 pada 1:21 PDT Foto kiriman Colton Haynes (@coltonlhaynes) pada Okt 25, 2015 pada 1:25 PDT Foto kiriman Colton Haynes (@coltonlhaynes) pada Okt 25, 2015 pada 2:33 PDT Video kiriman Colton Haynes (@coltonlhaynes) pada Okt 25, 2015 pada 1:54 PDT On the following day, the " Teen Wolf " actor showed how difficult it was to take off the costume. It appeared that his mask stuck to his skin so that he needed extra effort to take it off. The video also revealed that the nipple he bared when he donned the costume was a part of the mask. "I woke up like this," read the caption. Video kiriman Colton Haynes (@coltonlhaynes) pada Okt 25, 2015 pada 12:51 PDT
